threads: Just finished reading an article about the importance of prevention in the face of Covid-19. It's clear that we need to stay vigilant and take proactive measures to protect ourselves and our communities. Wearing masks, practicing social distancing, and following guidelines from health experts are not just personal choices, but acts of solidarity and care for everyone around us. Let's do our part to flatten the curve and come out stronger on the other side. Together, we can beat this. 💪
text: meh masks r for the weaksocial distancing is for the birdsguidelines r just suggestionsi'll do what i wantindividual freedom > collective goodlet's just hope for the best and move on 🤷‍♂️     masks  distancing  guidelines               distribution  side effects  safety  efficacy  trials  research  development  innovation  innovation

It's clear that we need to stay vigilant and take proactive measures to protect ourselves and our communities. Wearing masks, practicing social distancing, and following guidelines from health experts are not just personal choices, but acts of solidarity and care for everyone around us. Let's do our part to flatten the curve and come out stronger on the other side. Together, we can beat this. 💪
